description:
Ack, It`s Futaba!  I`ll have to sacrifice Hitoha to escape!
Hey wait, why`re you chasing me!  Argh, enough!  How long are you gonna chase me?
I`ll just have to hide in the equipment shed!
I`ll hide inside the hurdle blocks...
Get out, get out.  Good, she`s gone!
Uh...uh oh!  I`m STUCK!  Why?!  Someone help!
Oh...Hitoha...umm...help?
Source: crunchyroll
